DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study demonstrate bioequivalence Japanese commercial tablet Japanese commercial image liquid formulation . Secondary objective study estimate food effect Japanese commercial image liquid formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of Gabapentin Between Tablet And Liquid Formulation And The Food Effect Study Of Liquid Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease
